plot: Michael Palin travels around Brazil, from Amazonia to Rio, from the North East to the Deep South, to find out what makes this vast country tick.

cast.name: Susie Valerio
cast.role: English dub for all females characters

plot_es: Michael Palin travels around Brazil, from Amazonia to Rio, from the North East to the Deep South, to find out what makes this vast country tick.
title: Brazil with Michael Palin
